Question: This person continued doing HBO specials every year or every other year over the following decade and a half.
Hints: The book, chronicling most of this person's life and future plans (including the one-man show) was published in 2009.
On June 24 The New York Times printed an op-ed piece on this person by Jerry Seinfeld.
An audience member shouted, "Stop degrading us!" this person responded, "Thank you very much, whatever that was.
